metadata.name: To Eat is to Live
metadata.description:
Food is one of the important pieces of our lives that helps us grow, maintain our health, and bring a smile to our faces.

This artwork is a pixel art based on the photographs I took in Shinjuku, Japan. 
It is a lively and mysterious city, with an attractive atmosphere of swirling human emotions at a primal level.

1730 x 2304px   
.mp4

-------------------------------------
食べ物は私たちが育ち、健康を保ち、笑顔になるための、大切な人生のピースのひとつです。

この作品は、日本の新宿で私が撮影した写真をもとに制作したピクセルアートです。
にぎやかで妖しく、人間の本能的な感情が渦巻く空気感も魅力的な街です。
-------------------------------------


This piece may be used in future projects by Pam Oikawa
